duties_responsibilities.duty: Play a critical role in the success of the survey group and execution of projects of varying size, detail, and complexity.
Collaborate with Project Managers to establish project scope, budgets, staffing, and project schedule.
Utilize AutoCAD Civil 3D and related engineering software to complete assignments on time and within prescribed standards and budgets.
Review survey field calculations and adjust as needed.
Effectively communicate with internal staff, contractors, inspectors, and team leaders to maintain a dynamic team environment.
Attend paid training and development events, industry conferences, and networking opportunities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Surveying, Civil Engineering, or a related field
